titles: A parallel betwixt popery and phanaticism, in a letter to T.S.
notes: In verse. First line reads "I'm inform'd, your royal jurat ..."
A satire on the Popish Plot.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
